nodes.text: Killam Squadron was a squadron of Z-95 Headhunters employed by the Dimok Government's Navy, possibly named after the Killam. During the final stages of the Sepan Civil War Imperial forces lead by Admiral Harkov were to receive TIE Avengers from the Escort carrier Tropsobor. During that time both Ripoblus and Dimok forces had joined forces to attack Harkov while he was receiving these new fighters. The attack was repelled, by Harkov's TIE pilots, one of them being Maarek Stele, and Killam Squadron was destroyed as a result.
